I'm thrilled. I was awarded the Center for Regenerative Medicine Distinguished (CRM) Postdoctoral Scholars fellowship. This is a program for career development led by CRM with the mission "to develop highly trained individuals who can produce impactful research in regenerative medicine through an interdisciplinary training plan". Click [here](https://regenerativemedicine.wustl.edu/funding-2/crm-affiliates/) to know more about this program.
